Internship Offer Letter
Dear Applicant,
On behalf ofCollegeTips.in, I ampleased to extend you this offer oftemporary employment as an
Intern in our Summer Internship Program 2025. If you accept this offer, you will begin your
internship with the company and will be expected to work for the next thirty days. The Certificate,
LOR, Stipend, and other perks provided by the company during the tenure totally depends upon
your performance in the given modules and companypolicies.
We see a great collaboration ahead and you being an impeccable part ofour community.
I hope that your association with the company will be successful and rewarding. If you have any
queries, do not hesitate to contact us.
Sincerely,
RahulTiwari
Coordinator: Summer Internship Program2025
Email-id: internship@collegetips.in

CollegeTips Ed. Tech. Media Pvt. Ltd.
Delhi I Mumbai I Pune I Indore I Bhopal

www.collegetips.in I mail@collegetips.in
Summer Internship Program 2025
Every year CollegeTips comes up with its Summer Internship Program, which is the coolest and most
fun-learning internship you'll ever come across. This internship provides an opportunity to learn soft
skills like communication, problem solving skills, time management, team work, flexibility, report
making, presentation skills, public speaking, creative thinking etc. alongside work fields like Social
Media/Digital Marketing, Human Resource, Web Development, Finance, AI, Social Work, Media/PR,
Content Creation, Operations, Sales, Marketing, Management, and what not?
In this 30 days virtual internship, the perks are divided into 3 easy modules, you'll be definitely
receiving something after the completion of each module, like-
First Module - Internship Certificate
Second Module - LOR
Third Module - Stipend up to Rs. 10,000/- (Sales based)
For example:
Case 1: If you complete the first module only, you'll be receiving an Internship Certificate.
Case 2: If you complete the first and second module only, you’ll be receiving Internship Certificate and
LOR.
Case 3: If you complete the third module along with first and second module, you’ll be receiving
Internship Certificate, LOR and Stipend.
Notes-
 Ifan intern wants to earnonly certificate then he/she can skip module 2 and module 3.
 Module 3 is only for stipend. Your stipend is based on your successful completion of the
required sales task for CollegeTips.in.
 You willbe assigned different activitiesduring the internship period, for which you will be liable
for 30 days.
 In this duration of 30 days, you will earn a certificate, LOR and stipend after the successful
completion of all three modules. If you leave the internship before 30 days, you won’t be earning
any perks.
 We’re also providing a pre-placement offer to deserving students who will complete allthe modules.

CollegeTips Ed. Tech. Media Pvt. Ltd.

Terms & Conditions
Terms and Conditions
 The Intern agrees that he or she will faithfully and to the best of their ability carry out the duties and
responsibilities communicated to him or her by the Employer. The Intern shall comply with all
company policies, rules, and procedures at all times.
 The intern is prohibited to circumvent, disable or otherwise interfere with security-related features of
the platform or features that prevent or restrict the use or copying of any content or enforce limitations
on the use ofthe service or the content therein.
 The company requires that the intern should obtain parental consent before they start their tenure. This
is required so as to assure that the parents/guardians would be aware and non-objectionable towards
anytype of content that would be released in the future bythe Company.
 All creative work produced and devised during a project(s), creative, digital, software files, and related
correspondence remain the property– physically, intellectually, and in copyright, ofthe Company.
 You will not accept any present, commission or any sort of gratification in cash or kind from any
person, party, firm, or Company having to deal with the company and if you are offered any you
should immediately report the same to the Management.
 Once final posts/videos are uploaded on the social media or website will not be removed or deleted.
The Companycannot be held responsible for anysort ofcontroversial or inappropriate response.
 All photos and videos generated or uploaded on the internet would be retained on the media for
lifetime.
 Any kind of misbehavior towards the company will not be tolerated and the company has all the right
to discontinue an internship. Inthis case, an intern will not receive anykind of Certificate or Stipend.
 The intern is diffident to distribute any part of the work or the content through any medium without the
Company’s prior written authorization.
 In case ofany type ofdispute, the last decision is taken by the company only.
In case ofany queries, feel free to contact us at internship@collegetips.in.
